title: We see ourselves opening hundreds and hundreds of hotels over time in India: Elie Maalouf, CEO, IHG Hotels & Resorts
description: IHG Hotels & Resorts announces plans to double its presence in India to 100 hotels within five years. Strong signing performance in 2023 led to deals across luxury, premium, and essentials categories, with a focus on midscale and upper midscale segments. IHG targets high-growth secondary markets while expanding its diverse brand portfolio.
